# HealthConnect Bot - AI Health Diagnosis Assistant

This is a Flask-based web application that provides AI-powered health diagnosis based on patient symptoms and suggests appropriate medications.

## Project Type
- Python Flask web application
- AI-powered health diagnosis bot
- Deployable to cloud platforms (Render, Railway, Vercel)

## Key Features
- Patient symptom input interface
- AI-based diagnosis engine
- Medication recommendations
- Modern, responsive web UI
- Public deployment ready

## Development Guidelines
- Use Flask for backend API
- Implement AI/ML models for diagnosis
- Create responsive HTML/CSS/JS frontend
- Include deployment configurations
- Follow healthcare data best practices
